title: What are some good websites to find assistive technology products and services? - Quora

response.answer_text: To find assistive technology products and services, try the Independent Living Centre site, which has a huge database of assistive technology products, including Konnekt’s video phone. Videophone, a seniors phone and disabled phone, is a new and innovative assistive technology that helps seniors and those with a disability to reduce social isolation, regain independence and increase connection to family and community. If you’re in Australia, get your ATSA 2018 free tickets to the premier Assistive Technology event, ATSA 2018 Expo, Melbourne and Perth, May 2018. Or follow the above link to see products that will be exhibited (by exhibitors) at the conference, and to see which companies will be presenting at the Expo.
Askjan.org is excellent for job accommodations.  It also has general information about different disabilities that may have what you seek. Good luck
